testcase.name: testDetermineBlake2Algorithms
testcase.system-err: [main] INFO org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.HashAlgorithmTest - Blake2 algorithms: [org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.HashAlgorithm@72e34f77[Algorithm Name=BLAKE2-160,Digest Length=20 bytes,Description=Also known as Blake2b], HashAlgorithm[Algorithm Name=BLAKE2-256,Digest Length=32 bytes,Description=Also known as Blake2b], HashAlgorithm[Algorithm Name=BLAKE2-384,Digest Length=48 bytes,Description=Also known as Blake2b], HashAlgorithm[Algorithm Name=BLAKE2-512,Digest Length=64 bytes,Description=Also known as Blake2b]]

testcase.name: testDetermineBrokenAlgorithms
testcase.system-err: [main] INFO org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.HashAlgorithmTest - Broken algorithms: [HashAlgorithm[Algorithm Name=MD2,Digest Length=16 bytes,Description=Cryptographically broken due to collisions], HashAlgorithm[Algorithm Name=MD5,Digest Length=16 bytes,Description=Cryptographically broken due to collisions], HashAlgorithm[Algorithm Name=SHA-1,Digest Length=20 bytes,Description=Cryptographically broken due to collisions]]
